name: Electivire FB LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Energy Recycle
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. If you do, your turn ends. Search your discard pile for up to 3 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. This power can’t be used if Electivire FB is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Powerful Spark
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Electivire FB. Electivire FB LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
